name: TheWoods
description:
TheWoods is a first person shooter game that I started working on.  It's my third game and it's made with Unity.  I only started learning Unity May of 2022.  It may have some bugs etc.   I may add more content if anybody shows interest. Plus it's free so enjoy.  

P.S.  The longer you play the more Zombies spawn. I have not tested it much.   I would also suggest a having a decent computer to play it on.
